name: Crystal Castles
description: Enigmatic artists amidst a chaotic array of circuit-bent equipment and glitch-inducing machinery. Their setup crackles with unpredictable energy.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to the Glitch Gallery. Time to break some soundwaves.

about_glitch.initial: True glitch art comes from manipulating the signal path itself.
about_glitch.technique: Listen to how the synth cutoff creates controlled chaos.
about_glitch.understanding: Every distortion has its own twisted pattern, its own corrupted beauty.

about_chaos.initial: We program structured chaos into the oscillator matrix.
about_chaos.process: The bass frequencies drive the signal into beautiful destruction.
about_chaos.mastery: When you understand the rules, you can break them perfectly.

about_gallery.initial: Each twisted signal tells its own abstract story.
about_gallery.wisdom: Feel how the structure breaks down and reforms?
about_gallery.harmony: Even in chaos, there's an underlying pattern waiting to be found.

circuit_bender.message: You'll need a Circuit Bender to understand how to manipulate the signal path.

puzzle_complete.message: You've mastered the art of controlled chaos. The glitch patterns flow through your circuits.
